name: ChikungunyaVirusDiseaseTestsForChikungunyaVirusIgMAntibody
title: Chikungunya Virus Disease (Tests for Chikungunya Virus IgM Antibody)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of selected Chikungunya IgM antibodies.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Chikungunya),(Exclusion Criteria: - Panel tests, interpretation tests
- All other Arboviral conditions)
